General.Name: NISSHIN GROUP HOLDINGS Company Limited
General.Description: NISSHIN GROUP HOLDINGS Company, Limited plans, develops, constructs, manages, and sells condominiums in Japan. It is also involved in the rental of real estate businesses. In addition, the company engages in the brokerage, rental brokerage, and renovation activities; real estate stock and securitization businesses; and purchase, resale, and renovation business of second-hand condominiums. Further, it offers housing loan guarantees and housing funds for purchasers of condominiums; and plans and sells detached houses. NISSHIN GROUP HOLDINGS Company, Limited was incorporated in 1975 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
